place_description: Lottie’s Cafe is a cafe for the modern diner. Located in Uptown Charlotte, we are a coffee shop with extended food and tea offerings. We feature a full espresso program, matcha, breakfast and lunch. We also offer Charlotte themed souvenirs and gifts.

reviews_data.review_text: Great food, atmosphere, and the owners are exceptional hosts. They really went the extra mile, and we shared some excellent conversation that felt personal and homely. Definitely recommend!

Lottie's is one of the best cafes that I've been to and definitely the best in Charlotte! The whole vibe and ambiance are so calming and feel good, but the staff is what makes it amazing. Everyone is so friendly and welcoming and they make sure your order is perfect. I'm the pickiest matcha drinker and they made sure my matcha latte was best! The owner, Ashley, makes you feel like a friend from the moment you walk through the doors and brings out your order to you directly. Everything from the decor, the furniture, the food and coffees is exquisite. I was in Charlotte for a week while visiting, and came to this cafe almost every morning. Cannot wait to be back!

Omg where do I start ! I ordered 2 different lattes because I had to try them both and food. Everything was perfect ! The guy that took my order was pleasant and the lady that made my latte offered me a refill ! The atmosphere was calm and relaxing so I was able to sit and enjoy my book for atleast a hour and a half. I will definitely be back.
Great coffee

Lovely new coffee shop in the front of the Epicenter. Directly across from the Omni Hotel.

The atmosphere is very relaxing to post up and work from here for the day. I had the everything bagel with scrambled eggs, cheese and bacon bits and it was soooo good. The chef even came out to check on me and make sure everything was good. And this airplane latte...O.M.G sooo good! Definitely recommend!

Very nice new place. The Owner is extremely pleasant and welcoming. The counter folks are pleasant and helpful. The very best part is the ATMOSPHERE: calm, cool, quaint...better than any coffee chain. This how a coffee shop ought to be! Thank you "Lotties" I hope you stay you! Enjoy. peace.

Lovely staff. Lovely building. I had the iced airplane latte. My one negative would be the espresso taste is very mild. I like a smooth latte but it was very very subtle. I loved the appearance and the detail on this latte though. I would maybe try just a regular latte next time to get a vibe for their espresso alone next time.
Best place for breakfast in Charlotte. Friendly staff and great food!
Great cappuccino!
Nice place.  Team was very engaged and invested in the quality experience.  I like that this place gives miles on the AA Dining Program.  Breakfast items are limited and coffee was great.  Cheers!

Um can you say new favorite place???! Lottie's is a great addition to the uptown scene and will definitely be my second home! The perfect stylish place to grab brunch with friends while also a great environment to work or study in. The staff is so friendly and genuine, and let me tell you they sure know how to make a drink! Love love love!!

I visited Lottie's for the first time today. They were very busy but still extremely friendly/attentive. I tried the Hash Bowl and ordered an iced coffee. Everything was delicious and the cafe is beautifully designed. I look forward to coming here with my laptop during the week.
Lottie's you have won my heart!! The staff is so friendly and nice, the menu and the aesthetic of the shop gets a chef kiss! Local or not you must stop by! You won't be disappointed

Outstanding!  We loved everything about this place.  Delicious coffee, perfectly executed avocado toast (I added a scrambled egg and it made a great addition), and super friendly and professional service.  The vibe is just right -- very welcoming, stylish, friendly and laid-back.  Lots of thoughtful details.  And tucked in the corner is a great little mini boutique with super cute stuff.  If I lived in Charlotte, I'd be a regular for sure!
Lottie's is such a thoughtful and beautiful space located in the heart of the city. The gift shop section has so many goodies and the biscoff donut and iced latte were 1000/10.
Amazing staff and great vibes for anytime! Really liked the ambient music and I enjoyed working here for a change of scenery.

We love this adorable new spot. The service was excellent, the food was delicious and everything felt well priced.

I got the hash. The eggs were perfection and the sauce alongside it slaps. So good.
Cute and quaint. Well kept and very nice staff. The only complaint if I was to give one, is my egg should have been over medium. But that's me being picky. Best place on our trip.
Lottie's is such a great addition to the Charlotte coffee scene. You must try the Airplane Latte....it is delicious!! I highly recommend Lottie's!!
The coffee is great and the egg bites are AMAZING!! Everyone is super kind. It was a very pleasant, well rounded experience with great pricing for the uptown area.

The biscoff latte is so yummy and honestly my new favorite drink at the moment. This cafe honestly exceeded all my expectations. The atmosphere is calming, light, and clean. The food is delicious and the staff are so friendly and welcoming. The only downside would be the parking since it's in a busy area so do expect to probably pay for parking.

Had a really great Coffee from here! The inside was super cute and the staff was super nice. I ordered the George's Sammy and really enjoyed it. I think it would be just as good on a croissant. I did have to wait a little longer than I probably wanted to on food but not going to fault them at all for that given they are so new. Highly recommend trying this place out for your next coffee adventure!
The girls in the place were quite nice and definitely has a great vibe going for it. Impressed that they even do the designs for to go drinks.

Such a relaxed, sweet little coffee shop! The service was amazing and all the ladies working were SO kind and lovely. Iced coffee was great! Didn't try the baked goods but I desperately wanted to Would go back for the service alone. Also, they have pup cups that my dog highly recommends

This new cafe in uptown Charlotte is perfectly situated for a quick grab-and-go on your way to work, offering a delicious and varied breakfast menu. Its prime location and quality offerings make it an ideal stop for a morning boost.
